articles.title: Residents in Varthur and Gunjur protest over bad roads
articles.summary: Residents of Varthur and Gunjur staged a peaceful protest on Saturday, demanding pothole-free roads and urgent development of the Varthur‚ÄìGunjur stretch, which has become hazardous due to poor maintenance. The protest was organised in front of Prestige Lakeside Habitat, where residents, including children and senior citizens, stood with placards calling for safer roads. articles.title: Shocked , devastated : Gaza City assault leaves Palestinians traumatized
articles.summary: Gaza City, Gaza Strip ‚Äì The director of Al-Shifa hospital was on duty Saturday marshalling the facility's response to Israel's assault on Gaza City when two victims killed in a strike were delivered to the ward: his brother and his sister-in-law. articles.title: Prediction : Nvidia Stake in Intel Could Be the Catalyst for Its Next Trillion -
articles.summary: Nvidia ( NVDA 0.34% ) has just made a move that clearly is great news for Intel ( INTC -3.22% ) . The artificial intelligence (AI) chip powerhouse this week committed to investing $5 billion in the common stock of Intel, its beleaguered rival. As part of the deal, Nvidia will integrate Intel's chips into its AI infrastructure platforms. AI is an area where Intel has fallen behind, so this deal could mark a key turnaround for the company. Intel is
